full_text.3:
@Shayan86 The articles I read indicated there were members of the MPs demanding the death penalty for all the protestors detained, which is nearly 16,000.

Newsweek reported it accurately, and aren't responsible for politicians twisting it to score points. https://t.co/FEqdknBeX1
full_text.4: @GaryCallahan76 @emrazz The death penalty has no deterrent effect. Claims that each execution deters a certain number of murders have been thoroughly discredited by social science research.
full_text.5: @AdamCrigler I agree with you Adam. The only way I would consider death penalty for drug dealers is if the dealer was linked directly to drugs that definitively killed somebody, and even then, I’d only support if the drugs were confirmed tainted, because accidental and intentional ODs happen.
full_text.6: @miles_commodore How can a Christian be for the death penalty?
full_text.7: @LilaGraceRose Michigan too. Right through fetal viability (when the baby can live outside the womb) and up to its actual birth. Being conceived should not be a crime which deserves the death penalty 😞
